products.title: Jeans
Cap
T-Shirt
Sweatshirt
products.description:
A basic sweatshirt will easily complement any look and become a useful part of your wardrobe for all occasions.

Material:
- quality European 100% cotton.

Details and cut:
- classic cut;
- a tag with the Staff logo is sewn on the sleeve.

Season:
- year-round

Color:
- khaki.

Care:
- washing in normal mode at a temperature not higher than 30°C, without spinning;
- bleaching is prohibited;
- dry in a suspended state, without using artificial drying.


On the picture:
- height of the model - 182 cm;
- model weight - 74 kg;
- size of things - "M".
